computeLogCeil(double) - Method in class org.afree.chart.axis.LogarithmicAxis
Returns the smallest (closest to negative infinity) double value that is not less than the argument, is equal to a mathematical integer and satisfying the condition that log base 10 of the value is an integer (i.e., the value returned will be a power of 10: 1, 10, 100, 1000, etc.).
computeLogFloor(double) - Method in class org.afree.chart.axis.LogarithmicAxis
Returns the largest (closest to positive infinity) double value that is not greater than the argument, is equal to a mathematical integer and satisfying the condition that log base 10 of the value is an integer (i.e., the value returned will be a power of 10: 1, 10, 100, 1000, etc.).

A specialised subclass of the XYLineAndShapeRenderer that requires an IntervalXYDataset and represents the y-interval by shading an area behind the y-values on the chart.
DeviationRenderer() - Constructor for class org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.DeviationRenderer
Creates a new renderer that displays lines and shapes for the data items, as well as the shaded area for the y-interval.

Creates a new renderer.

A state object that is passed to each call to drawItem.

Creates a new state instance.

DialFrame - Interface in org.afree.chart.plot.dial
A dial frame is the face plate for a dial plot - it is always drawn last.

A dial layer draws itself within a reference frame.

A call-back method for receiving notification of a change to a DialLayer.
dialLayerChanged(DialLayerChangeEvent) - Method in class org.afree.chart.plot.dial.DialPlot
Receives notification when a layer has changed, and responds by forwarding a PlotChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
DialLayerChangeEvent - Class in org.afree.chart.plot.dial
An event that can be forwarded to any DialLayerChangeListener to signal a change to a DialLayer.

Creates a new instance.

The interface via which an object is notified of changes to a DialLayer.

setShapesFilled(boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
setShapesFilled(Boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
setShapesFilled(Boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.StandardXYItemRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.8, you should avoid using this method and rely on just the per-series (StandardXYItemRenderer.setSeriesShapesFilled(int, Boolean)) and base-level (StandardXYItemRenderer.setBaseShapesVisible( boolean)) settings.
setShapesFilled(Boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYLineAndShapeRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.7, use the per-series and base level settings.
setShapesVisible(Boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).
setShapesVisible(boolean) - Method in class org.afree.chart.renderer.category.LineAndShapeRenderer
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart 1.0.7 (the override facility is unnecessary, just use the per-series and base (default) settings).

XYTitleAnnotation(double, double, Title) - Constructor for class org.afree.chart.annotations.XYTitleAnnotation
Creates a new annotation to be displayed at the specified (x, y) location.

Creates a new annotation to be displayed at the specified (x, y) location.
XYToolTipGenerator - Interface in org.afree.chart.labels
Interface for a tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
XYURLGenerator - Interface in org.afree.chart.urls
Interface for a URL generator for plots that uses data from an XYDataset.

Y

YEAR - Static variable in class org.afree.chart.axis.DateTickUnit
Deprecated.
As of JFreeChart version 1.0.13, use DateTickUnitType instead.

Year.
Year - Class in org.afree.data.time
Represents a year in the range -9999 to 9999.

Creates a new Year, based on the current system date/time.

Creates a time period representing a single year.
Year(Date) - Constructor for class org.afree.data.time.Year
Creates a new Year, based on a particular instant in time, using the default time zone.
Year(Date, TimeZone) - Constructor for class org.afree.data.time.Year
Deprecated.
Since JFreeChart 1.0.12, use Year.Year(Date, TimeZone, Locale) instead.
Year(Date, TimeZone, Locale) - Constructor for class org.afree.data.time.Year
Creates a new Year instance, for the specified time zone and locale.

zoom(double) - Method in class org.afree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot

Zoomable - Interface in org.afree.chart.plot
A plot that is zoomable must implement this interface to provide a mechanism for the DemoView to control the zooming.
zoomDomainAxes(double, PlotRenderingInfo, PointF) - Method in class org.afree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot
This method does nothing, because CategoryPlot doesn't support zooming on the domain.
